spanGrp.span: We had not studied Turkish at school, we studied in Russian at the Russian school we had.
turetskii biz ohumadıh biz ohuduh russki škola russki škola bıl u nas
Now also they teach Russian as a foreign language.
šas tože russki predmetam peredayut ohudirlär ohudirlär russki ohudirlär inostranni yazık sairlär
Russian is considered as a foreign language now, that’s it.
russki yazık šas inostranni yazık anelä išlär
Turkish language has no writing, we have not studied.
ture turetskinın yazmasi yohtur turetski yaziklär biz ohuduh šei etmämišıh
We studied in Russian and write in Russian.
biz urusča ohuduh urusčada yazirıh urusčada šei edirıh
Why our last name is ending with “ov”? Because the Turkish caught us, placed us in captivity and were burning us.
bizım bizım bizä bizım nia familiamız ov turklar duttular bizläri oki šeidä nemes otu iš šei duttular oki v plen v plen papali nas zažigali zažigali
They asked why our last name was “ov”.
skazali čto dedılär ki nia sizın familiazlarız ov
Our last name became “ov” from Russians.
bizım familialarımız ov oldi šeidän russkikh russkikh
They asked why, oh I switched to Russian, I’m confused sometimes.
pačemu skazali kogda uf urusčaa gettım pereputayu nemnožka
I am working as a security guard at school, I earn a bit of money, well it’s quite low one hundred and fifty but what to do.
ya bän bän školada išliräm kara ğarağulum školada ğarağulum birğač kapik verirlär nu az verirlär nä edäsın yuz älli manat azdır
My young son and also my niece are working, my job is to open the doors of school.
bu čüčük oğlum išlir birdä plemyanitsam išlirlär bändä ačirım školai šei edirım
